nodes.text: Akk dogs were a type of dog native to Anoat, a planet in the Anoat sector. They were quadrupedal, with red, scaly skin, four horns, a pair of blue eyes, and rows of pointed teeth. At the time of the Iron Blockade, akk dogs freely roamed the streets of Anoat. When obtained young, akk dogs actually made good companions and guardians.
